text: Spring is coming, flowers are growing
Look at how the field’s overflowing
With the colors pink, gold, and blue
Go on, kids, and pick one or two
Grass is growing green in the sunshine
A lark is singing songs to the springtime
Flying in the clouds all day long
Listen kids, she’s singing her song
The cuckoo bird is calling out loudly
The quail in the field’s strutting proudly
Lambs enjoy the sun’s gentle rays
Come on, kids, let’s go watch them graze
